web_snippets: Kerry Heffernan Biography. Born in Pennsylvania and raised in Connecticut ... Kerry is currently Chef at Grand Banks, a seasonal Oyster Bar and galley on the.
In New York City, Kerry Heffernan is executive chef at Grand Banks oyster bar, an experienced fisherman, and an active advocate for seafood ...
